languages.text: "Я верю, что всякое знание может быть укрощено во славу Человечества".
"I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Я верю, что всякое знание может быть укрощено во славу Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."
"I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."
"I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."
"I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."
"I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."

languages.text: “我相信一切知识都可以被驯服，为人类的荣耀服务。”
languages.original_text: "I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “我相信一切知识都可以被驯服，为人类的荣耀服务。”

languages.text: «Creo que cualquier conocimiento, sea el que sea, puede controlarse para gloria de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que cualquier conocimiento, sea el que sea, puede controlarse para gloria de la Humanidad».

languages.text: 「人類の栄光のためならば、どのような技術でも飼いならせると思っている」
languages.original_text: "I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「人類の栄光のためならば、どのような技術でも飼いならせると思っている」

languages.text: "Ich glaube, dass sämtliches Wissen zum Wohle der Menschheit gezähmt werden kann."
languages.original_text: "I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, dass sämtliches Wissen zum Wohle der Menschheit gezähmt werden kann."

languages.text: « J'estime que n'importe quelle connaissance peut être domptée pour la gloire de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « J'estime que n'importe quelle connaissance peut être domptée pour la gloire de l'humanité. »

languages.text: "Her türlü irfanın, İnsanlığın şanı uğruna ehlîleştirilebileceğine inanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I believe that any and all knowledge can be tamed for the glory of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Her türlü irfanını İnsanlık uğruna ehlileştirilebileceğine inanıyorum."
